name: Meng He
content: Meng He's Home Page Meng He Faculty of Computer Science Dalhousie University Home Research Publications Teaching Biography Meng He Faculty of Computer Science Dalhousie University 6050 University Avenue PO BOX 15000 Halifax, NS B3H 4R2 Canada Email: mhe [at] cs.dal.ca Telephone: (902) 494-4056 Office: Mona Campbell 4245 I am a Professor at the Faculty of Computer Science in Dalhousie University. I obtained my PhD at Cheriton School of Computer Science in the University of Waterloo in 2008. Prior to joining Dalhousie University, I held postdoctoral and research positions in Carleton University and University of Waterloo. My research are in the areas of algorithms, data structures and computational geometry, with applications in efficiency issues of databases, text retrieval, bioinformatics and geographic information systems. A brief autobiography is available. I am recruiting graduate students pursuing master's and PhD studies. I am also interested in supervising honors thesis and USRA internship. Prospective students please have a look at my research and publications.
